name: obsidian-auto-description-openai
description: 自动为Obsidian文档生成摘要并添加到Front Matter中，使用OpenAI API

scripts.version: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('manifest.json', JSON.stringify({...require('./manifest.json'), version: process.env.npm_package_version}, null, 2))" && git add manifest.json
